Description.Text: This establishment is near the ferry harbour, just 200 m from the Villa Erba International Congress Centre and some 500 m away from a selection of bars and pubs. Guests are invited to discover the surrounding historic villas. Links to the local public transport network and the bus station are close at hand and shopping venues are about 2 km away from the hotel, which is around 3 km from a sandy beach and 5.5 away from Como S. Giovanni railway station. Milan is 50 km away and Lugano (Switzerland) is 20 km from the establishment. Lugano Airport is approximately 30 km from the hotel, which is also around 60 km from Milan Malpensa Airport and 70 km away from Milan Linate Airport respectively.

This 22-room historic hotel was completely renovated in 2005. It offers a friendly staff and a comfortable on-site restaurant. In the summer guests can dine in the garden while they can enjoy the rustic cellar with vaulted ceilings in the winter. In addition to a lobby area with 24-hour reception and check-out services, hotel safes and currency exchange desk, further facilities available to guests at this air-conditioned, family-friendly accommodation include a bar. WLAN Internet access and room and laundry services are provided for a fee and there is a bike hire service and car park. Guests arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel garage for an extra charge.
